footer.footerDescription: We provide cutting-edge solutions that transform your business and drive success in the digital age.

hero.title: Your Gateway to Europe and Canada
hero.subtitle: Discover the power of innovation and excellence
hero.description: We support talented individuals from the Maghreb (Tunisia, Morocco, Algeria) in finding professional opportunities in the European Union. From job searches to obtaining the EU Blue Card.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer a range of services to help you navigate your career journey in Europe, including job placement, visa assistance, and professional development.

stats.title: Our Results Speak
stats.description: We have successfully assisted numerous individuals in their career transitions, helping them secure jobs and navigate the complexities of moving to Europe.

process.title: Our Services
process.description: We offer a range of services to help you navigate your career journey in Europe, including job placement, visa assistance, and professional development.

card1.title: Profile Assessment
card1.description: Comprehensive analysis of your profile, skills, and career goals to identify the best opportunities.

card2.title: Opportunity Search
card2.description: Identification of high-demand positions matching your profile within our partner company network.

card3.title: Preparation & Application
card3.description: CV optimization, interview preparation, and submission of targeted applications.

card4.title: Negotiation & Contract
card4.description: Support in salary negotiations and validation of the employment contract in compliance with EU requirements.

card5.title: Blue Card Procedures
card5.description: Complete preparation and tracking of your EU Blue Card application file with our legal experts.

card6.title: Relocation & Support
card6.description: Support for your relocation to Europe and follow-up on your professional and personal integration.

ApplySection.title: Apply Now !
ApplySection.subtitle: Kickstart your journey with us.
ApplySection.description: Submit your details today and let us help you take the next step, weâ€™re here to connect you with the right opportunities.

AboutSection.title: About us
AboutSection.description: We specialize in connecting skilled professionals from outside the EU, particularly from Tunisia, Morocco, and Algeria, with job opportunities across Europe. Our mission is to simplify the international hiring process by offering personalized support, legal expertise, and access to a wide network of partner companies seeking qualified talent.

FormExperience.title: Experience
FormExperience.noExperience: No experiences added yet. Click "Add Experience" to add your work experience (optional).
